sn14.25:1.2: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element:
sn14.25:1.3: those who kill living creatures with those who kill living creatures,
sn14.25:1.7: consume alcoholic drinks that cause negligence …
sn14.25:2.1: Those who refrain from killing living creatures …
sn14.25:2.5: those who refrain from consuming alcoholic drinks that cause negligence with those who refrain from consuming alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.”
